comments:
It is not possible to create a new test within a testsuite using the File-> new 
actions.  The following stack trace always occurs:

Steps to reproduce:
1.  create a new java project.
2.  create a new test suite for manual tests (using file-> new -> other -> test 
suite -> test suite).  Do not give the test suite any behaviours.
3.  Open the new testcase wizard using file -> new -> other -> test elements -> 
test case.
4.  On the first page of the wizard select the previously created test suite.
5.  On the second page of the wizard select the 'test' element.  This is the 
point of failure.

Line 53 of org.eclipse.hyades.test.manual.internal.wizard.ManualTestCaseNewWizard:

ITestSuite testSuite = (ITestSuite)getSelection().getFirstElement();

The cast is done without a check on the type of the selection.
I reassign this defect to Joe (since he is the owner of this plugin).
